item.title: Varian is Hiring For Software Engineer
item.author: Sandeep Undrakonda
item.description: Varian Company: Varian (Link At Bottom) Job Title: Software Developer - Oncology Solutions Job Description: As a Software Developer at Varian, a Siemens Healthineers Company, your role is vital in fighting cancer. We develop user-friendly and efficient software solutions for oncology. Our goal is to create a world without fear of cancer. You will work closely with a team of developers and testers to contribute to this mission. Strong programming skills in Java are a must, and experience with an additional language like Golang, Python, Kotlin, or JavaScript is a plus.
